detailsOfAchievement: Ours is an association functioning under the name Garments Machinery Manufacturers & Suppliers Association (Regd.) and registered under Societies Act - XXI of 1860. We maintain upto date record of MSME member units and of the circulars pertaining to Govt. Policies/schemes. We also hold periodical meetings of our association for deliberating day to day happenings in the industry, particularly Govt. policies / schemes. Also we provide assistance to MSME member units in registration process of Udyog Aadhaar Memorandum No. As it is democratic organization, we hold our General Elections of office bearers after each two years to run the smooth working of the association. We have held number of seminars in association with MSME-DI Ludhiana office to promote MSMEs favored Industries Industrial policies to help the local/state Industry as and when required. We have honored stalwarts of our Industry during these seminars for their contribution towards up gradation as well as adoption of new concepts. We have organized a Mega GMMSA EXPO INDIA - 2016, Industrial Exhibition covering over 1.30 thousand Sq. feet area, largest ever Exhibition from 19th to 22nd February, 2016 at Dana Mandi, Bahadur Ke Road, Ludhiana- Punjab (India) on Knitting, Dyeing, Finishing, Embroidery, Printing ,Processing & Finishing, Sewing Machines and Accessories. Going through the overwhelming response of knitwear and textile Industry and very successful maiden launch of world class International Exhibition GMMSA EXPO INDIA â€“ 2016, Garments Machinery Manufacturers & Suppliers Association (Regd.) â€“ GMMSA is organizing its second edition of GMMSA EXPO INDIA â€“ 2017 at Dana Mandi, Bahadur-Ke Road, Ludhiana â€“Punjab

detailsOfAchievement: Swami Vivekanand Medical Mission (Regd.) is working since past 40 years in the field of health conditions of the poor and weaker sections of the society. It started its first hospital in a remote locality of Islamabad, Amritsar in a single hired room at Chowk Rajputan in the year 1979. Presently, Five medical units namely Allopathic, Eyes, Dental, Physiotherapy and clinical laboratory, in a three storied building at 12- Makan (Islamabad) area of Amritsar, are attending around 200 patients daily.
